ankiConnectUrlDesc: HTTP API URL for Anki Connect plugin
defaultDeckDesc: Default deck to export flashcards to Anki
defaultModelDesc: Default note model to use when exporting to Anki
frontFieldDesc: Field name to store the front content of flashcards
backFieldDesc: Field name to store the back content of flashcards
syncModeDesc: Choose between manual and automatic sync mode
syncConfirm: Are you sure you want to sync SiYuan flashcards to Anki?
ankiNotRunning: Anki is not running or AnkiConnect plugin is not enabled
syncBackground: SiYuan to Anki sync plugin is running in the background
